summary: The Black Lung Benefits Program helps coal miners who have been totally disabled due to black lung disease. Coal companies found liable or the Black Lung Disability Trust Fund pay these benefits. The trust may pay if, for example, a company goes bankrupt. A domestic coal tax is the trust’s primary funding source. We reported in 2018 that the trust faces financial challenges and that...
title: Black Lung Benefits Program: Financing and Oversight Challenges Are Adversely Affecting the Trust Fund
